content: super cute crochet beanie hat for you to work up this weekend the slightly twisted beanie would make wonderful gifts for your friends and family this year free written pattern and video tutorial available at heather s craft corner 1 video tutorial of the full pattern can also be found here 2 left-handed video tutorial coming july 24 skill level intermediate materials yarn worsted weight 200 yds / 180m hooks h/8 5 00mm i/9 5 50mm stitch markers yarn needle pom pom 4 gauge band - 2 wide 4 =12 row hat - 4 = 7 rnds 12 sts sizes one size - adult *instruction for adjust size included 1 https //heatherscraftcorner com/slightly-twisted-beanie/ 2 https //youtu be/sgvzijipf0k
